product_description: Great Upgrade your wash routine with the Chenille Premium Scratch-Free Microfiber Wash Mitt . Built for enthusiasts and professionals, this plush mitt makes it easy to achieve a swirl-free, high-quality wash on any vehicle. As a microfiber mitt for cars, it is made from ultra-soft chenille microfiber that gently lifts and traps dirt, grime, and debris away from the surface, reducing friction and minimizing the risk of scratches or swirl marks.The dense microfiber noodles hold more soap and water than traditional sponges, creating consistent lubrication that allows for safer, more effective cleaning with every pass. The Chenille Wash Mitt is safe for use on all finishes—including clear coat, single-stage paint, chrome, glass, and plastic—the Chenille Wash Mitt ensures maximum cleaning performance without causing damage. Its soft texture glides smoothly across surfaces, making it the ideal choice for paintwork, wheels, and even delicate areas like mirrors and chrome trim. The elastic cuff provides a snug, comfortable fit, giving you better control and less hand fatigue during extended washing sessions.5-finger design,The gloves are coated inside to prevent soap from leaking through.Whether you’re washing cars, trucks, motorcycles, RVs, or boats, the mitt is also versatile enough for household cleaning tasks like windows and other delicate surfaces, making it an essential addition to any car detailing kit. Durable and reusable, the Chenille Premium Wash Mitt is machine washable and built to withstand repeated use.Used for routine vehicle maintenance by anyone interested in auto detailing, it supports the detailer who wants a professional-quality wash with a scratch-free finish every time.
